epics.title: User Registration and Authentication
epics.description: Develop secure user registration and login functionality for customers and staff, enabling account creation, authentication, and profile management. This is foundational for personalized booking and secure access, directly supporting customer convenience and data security.

stories.title: Customer Registration UI
stories.description: As a new customer, I want to register for an account via web and mobile so that I can book and manage appointments.
acceptance_criteria: Registration form is accessible on web and mobile
Form validates required fields (name, email, password)
Error messages are displayed for invalid input
Successful registration redirects to login or dashboard

subtasks.title: Design Registration Form
subtasks.description: Create responsive UI for registration form on web and mobile.

subtasks.title: Implement Form Validation
subtasks.description: Add client-side validation for required fields and password strength.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend API
subtasks.description: Connect registration form to backend registration endpoint.

stories.title: User Registration API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to implement secure APIs for user registration, including email verification and password encryption.
acceptance_criteria: API accepts registration data and creates user record
Passwords are securely hashed
Duplicate email addresses are rejected
Email verification link is sent

subtasks.title: Create Registration Endpoint
subtasks.description: Develop REST API for user registration.

subtasks.title: Implement Password Hashing
subtasks.description: Use industry-standard hashing for storing passwords.

subtasks.title: Send Verification Email
subtasks.description: Integrate email service to send verification links.

stories.title: Login and Authentication UI
stories.description: As a user, I want to log in securely to access my account and manage appointments.
acceptance_criteria: Login form is accessible on web and mobile
Form validates credentials
Error messages for invalid login
Successful login redirects to dashboard

subtasks.title: Design Login Form
subtasks.description: Create responsive UI for login form.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication Flow
subtasks.description: Connect login form to backend authentication API.

stories.title: Authentication API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to implement secure login and session management.
acceptance_criteria: API validates user credentials
Sessions or JWT tokens are issued on successful login
Failed logins are logged
Account lockout after multiple failed attempts

subtasks.title: Develop Login Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement REST API for user authentication.

subtasks.title: Implement Session Management
subtasks.description: Issue and validate JWT tokens for authenticated sessions.

subtasks.title: Account Lockout Logic
subtasks.description: Add logic to lock accounts after repeated failed logins.

stories.title: User Registration & Authentication Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I need to test registration and authentication flows for security and usability.
acceptance_criteria: All registration and login scenarios are tested
Security vulnerabilities are identified and reported
Usability issues are documented

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all registration and login flows.

subtasks.title: Security Testing
subtasks.description: Test for vulnerabilities (e.g., SQL injection, weak passwords).

epics.title: Appointment Scheduling and Management
epics.description: Implement core appointment booking, rescheduling, and cancellation features for customers and staff. This epic is central to the business goal of reducing manual errors, optimizing resource utilization, and enhancing customer convenience.

stories.title: Appointment Booking UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to search for available slots and book appointments via web and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: Available slots are displayed in a calendar view
User can select date/time and confirm booking
Booking confirmation is shown on screen

subtasks.title: Design Calendar View
subtasks.description: Create responsive calendar UI for slot selection.

subtasks.title: Implement Booking Flow
subtasks.description: Integrate UI with backend booking API.

stories.title: Appointment Booking API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to provide APIs for searching, booking, rescheduling, and cancelling appointments.
acceptance_criteria: API returns available slots based on resource availability
API creates, updates, and cancels bookings
Conflicting bookings are prevented

subtasks.title: Develop Slot Search Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement API to return available appointment slots.

subtasks.title: Develop Booking Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement API to create new bookings.

subtasks.title: Develop Reschedule/Cancel Endpoints
subtasks.description: Implement APIs to reschedule and cancel appointments.

stories.title: Reschedule and Cancel UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to reschedule or cancel my appointments online.
acceptance_criteria: User can view upcoming appointments
User can select an appointment to reschedule or cancel
Confirmation dialogs are shown

subtasks.title: Design Appointment List View
subtasks.description: Create UI to list and manage upcoming appointments.

subtasks.title: Implement Reschedule/Cancel Flow
subtasks.description: Integrate UI with backend reschedule/cancel APIs.

stories.title: Appointment Management Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I need to test all appointment management flows for correctness and edge cases.
acceptance_criteria: All booking, rescheduling, and cancellation scenarios are tested
Edge cases (double booking, invalid slots) are covered

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all appointment management flows.

subtasks.title: Edge Case Testing
subtasks.description: Test for double bookings and invalid slot selection.

stories.title: Stakeholder Review and Feedback
stories.description: As a product manager, I need to review appointment management features with stakeholders and gather feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Demo is conducted with stakeholders
Feedback is documented and prioritized

subtasks.title: Prepare Demo
subtasks.description: Prepare demo environment and walkthrough.

subtasks.title: Document Feedback
subtasks.description: Collect and document stakeholder feedback.

epics.title: Automated Notifications and Reminders
epics.description: Implement automated email and SMS notifications for booking confirmations and reminders to reduce no-shows and improve customer experience.

stories.title: Notification Service Integration
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to integrate with email and SMS providers to send notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Booking confirmation emails/SMS are sent on successful booking
Reminder emails/SMS are sent 24 hours before appointment
Failed notifications are logged

subtasks.title: Integrate Email Provider
subtasks.description: Set up and integrate transactional email service.

subtasks.title: Integrate SMS Provider
subtasks.description: Set up and integrate SMS gateway for notifications.

subtasks.title: Implement Notification Logging
subtasks.description: Log all sent and failed notifications for audit.

stories.title: Reminder Scheduler
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to implement a scheduler to trigger reminders 24 hours before appointments.
acceptance_criteria: Reminders are sent exactly 24 hours before appointment
Scheduler handles missed or failed reminders
Reminders are not sent for cancelled appointments

subtasks.title: Develop Reminder Scheduler
subtasks.description: Implement background job to trigger reminders.

subtasks.title: Handle Missed Reminders
subtasks.description: Implement logic to retry or log missed reminders.

stories.title: Notification Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I need to test all notification scenarios for accuracy and reliability.
acceptance_criteria: All notification types are tested
Failed notifications are logged and reported

subtasks.title: Functional Notification Testing
subtasks.description: Test booking confirmations and reminders.

subtasks.title: Failure Scenario Testing
subtasks.description: Test and verify logging of failed notifications.

stories.title: Notification Preferences UI
stories.description: As a customer, I want to manage my notification preferences (email/SMS) in my profile.
acceptance_criteria: User can enable/disable email and SMS notifications
Preferences are saved and respected by the system

subtasks.title: Design Preferences UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for managing notification preferences.

subtasks.title: Integrate with Backend
subtasks.description: Connect preferences UI to backend API.

stories.title: Notification Preferences API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to store and respect user notification preferences.
acceptance_criteria: API saves and retrieves user preferences
Notifications are sent based on preferences

subtasks.title: Develop Preferences Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement API to save and retrieve notification preferences.

subtasks.title: Integrate Preferences with Notification Logic
subtasks.description: Update notification logic to respect user preferences.

epics.title: Admin Dashboard and Reporting
epics.description: Develop an admin dashboard for staff to view, manage, and report on appointments, supporting operational efficiency and business insights.

stories.title: Admin Dashboard UI
stories.description: As an admin, I want a dashboard to view and manage all appointments.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays list of all appointments
Admin can filter, edit, or cancel appointments
UI is responsive and accessible

subtasks.title: Design Dashboard Layout
subtasks.description: Create responsive dashboard UI for admins.

subtasks.title: Implement Appointment Management
subtasks.description: Integrate dashboard with backend appointment APIs.

stories.title: Admin Management API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to provide APIs for admins to view, edit, and cancel appointments.
acceptance_criteria: API returns all appointments with filters
API allows editing and cancelling appointments
Access is restricted to admin users

subtasks.title: Develop Admin Appointment Endpoints
subtasks.description: Implement APIs for admin appointment management.

subtasks.title: Implement Access Control
subtasks.description: Restrict endpoints to admin users only.

stories.title: Reporting UI
stories.description: As an admin, I want to generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports on appointments.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can select report type and date range
Reports are displayed in table and chart formats
Reports can be exported as CSV

subtasks.title: Design Reporting UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for report selection and display.

subtasks.title: Implement Export Functionality
subtasks.description: Enable CSV export for reports.

stories.title: Reporting API
stories.description: As a backend developer, I need to provide APIs to generate and deliver appointment reports.
acceptance_criteria: API generates reports for selected date ranges
Reports include summary statistics and trends
Reports are exportable as CSV

subtasks.title: Develop Report Generation Logic
subtasks.description: Implement logic to aggregate and summarize appointment data.

subtasks.title: Implement CSV Export
subtasks.description: Enable API to export reports as CSV.

stories.title: Admin Dashboard & Reporting Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I need to test admin dashboard and reporting features for accuracy and security.
acceptance_criteria: All admin features are tested
Access control is verified
Report data is accurate

subtasks.title: Functional Testing
subtasks.description: Test all admin dashboard and reporting flows.

subtasks.title: Security Testing
subtasks.description: Verify access control and data privacy.

epics.title: Infrastructure, Security, and Compliance
epics.description: Set up cloud-based infrastructure, ensure data encryption, system availability, and compliance with security standards to support at least 500 concurrent users.

stories.title: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I need to provision and configure cloud infrastructure for hosting the system.
acceptance_criteria: Infrastructure is provisioned on cloud (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Environments for dev, test, and production are set up
System supports 500 concurrent users

subtasks.title: Provision Cloud Resources
subtasks.description: Set up compute, storage, and networking resources.

subtasks.title: Configure Environments
subtasks.description: Set up dev, test, and production environments.

stories.title: SSL/TLS and Data Encryption
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I need to implement SSL/TLS for secure data transmission and ensure encryption at rest.
acceptance_criteria: All web and API traffic is encrypted via SSL/TLS
Sensitive data is encrypted at rest

subtasks.title: Implement SSL/TLS
subtasks.description: Configure SSL/TLS certificates for all endpoints.

subtasks.title: Enable Data Encryption at Rest
subtasks.description: Configure database and storage encryption.

stories.title: Monitoring and Availability
stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I need to implement monitoring and alerting to ensure 99.5% system availability.
acceptance_criteria: System uptime is monitored
Alerts are triggered for downtime or performance issues
Availability reports are generated

subtasks.title: Set Up Monitoring Tools
subtasks.description: Implement monitoring for uptime and performance.

subtasks.title: Configure Alerts
subtasks.description: Set up alerting for downtime and anomalies.

stories.title: Infrastructure and Security Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I need to test infrastructure, security, and compliance requirements.
acceptance_criteria: Penetration testing is performed
System availability is verified
Compliance with security standards is documented

subtasks.title: Penetration Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct security testing for vulnerabilities.

subtasks.title: Availability Testing
subtasks.description: Test system for uptime and failover.

stories.title: Data Privacy and Compliance Review
stories.description: As an IT/legal team member, I need to review the system for compliance with data privacy regulations.
acceptance_criteria: Data privacy policies are documented
System complies with applicable regulations (e.g., GDPR)

subtasks.title: Review Data Privacy Policies
subtasks.description: Document and review privacy policies.

subtasks.title: Compliance Audit
subtasks.description: Audit system for regulatory compliance.

stories.title: Load and Performance Testing
stories.description: As a DevOps/QA engineer, I need to test the system under load to ensure it supports 500 concurrent users.
acceptance_criteria: System is tested with 500 concurrent users
Performance bottlenecks are identified and addressed

subtasks.title: Develop Load Test Scripts
subtasks.description: Create scripts to simulate concurrent users.

subtasks.title: Execute Load Tests
subtasks.description: Run load tests and analyze results.
